name: Arborealis
description:
Forest Means Family!
Carve runes into trees to harness powerful effects, build a world-spanning network of Warp Trees, tie your life force to a soul tree, and more in Arborealis!
This is a mod we developed to fill a gap in the magical market of Fabric. While not all encompassing, our plans for this mod are vast, and we're excited to be a part of the modding community.
Enjoy!
authors: All the lovely folks on the Fabric Discord!
